name: RS Bridge
category: 進階電腦週邊設備：週邊設備

pages.text: The RS Bridge is able to interact with Refined Storage. You can retrieve items, craft items, get all items as a list and more.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/peripherals/rs_bridge/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!

mapping.0: 計算機工藝：進階計算機

pages.text: Connect your RS Bridge to a computer to make use of it!
